summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4584 for the improvement of 36th Avenue South, from Andover Street to Dakota Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of wooden curbs and gutters and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53465, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
